traits.name: Discern Lie
entries: The drow knows when she hears a creature speak a lie in a language she knows.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The drow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The drow makes three death lance attacks.

actions.name: Death Lance
entries: Melee atk +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d6 + 5 damage) piercing damage plus 18 (4d8 damage) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage it takes. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.
